section.name: Introduction
section.p: Provides a highly enriched integration of the Groovy language into Maven 2.

Groovy sources compile directly into Java byte-code, and thus Maven can't really tell the difference between what was written in Java and what was written in Groovy. This provides an ideal integration where anything you could do in Java you can also do in Groovy... only with Groovy you feel all nice and happy afterwards :-P

ul.li: Developing with Maven 2 and Groovy: A guide to developing with Maven 2 and Groovy.
Developing Groovy Plugins: A guide to developing Groovy plugins for Maven 2.
Groovy Maven Plugin: Provides support for execution, compilation and other facets of Groovy development.
Groovy Maven Archetype: Generate a skeleton project for a Groovy-based Maven project.
Groovy Runtime API: Allows pluggable integration with a Groovy Runtime with out any version specifics.
Groovy Runtime 1.0: Provides support for using Groovy version 1.0.
Groovy Runtime 1.1: Provides support for using Groovy version 1.1 (1.1-rc-3).
Default Groovy Runtime: Provides support for using the default supported Groovy version.
Groovy Mojo Support: Provides classes to support Groovy Mojo implementations.
Groovy Mojo Archetype: Generate a skeleton project for a Groovy-based Maven plugin.
Plugin Examples: Examples of (some familiar) Maven 2 plugins implemented in Groovy.
